'''Alpha v1.0.8_01'''<ref>{{ytl|VzgIYmrIyCk|For that burning sensation|Malikat42|July 20, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]], released on July 19, 2010 to fix several crashes.

== Technical ==
'''General'''
* Removed some debugging code, making it less crash-prone.<ref>{{won|833718811|Minecraft Alpha 1.0.8|July 19, 2010}}</ref></onlyinclude>
